Title: Chairman Mao had boundless trust in Chairman Hua, the army and the people of the whole nation wholeheartedly supports Chairman Hua
Notes: The slogan on the banner reads "Chairman Mao's handwritten instruction to Comrade Hua Guofeng: With you in charge, I am at ease". In the background are the Collected Works of Marx and Engels, the Collected Works of Lenin, and two volumes of the Selected Works of Mao Zedong.Although the poster is undated, it has been published (immediately?) after September 1976.
Theme: Mao and Hua: 'With you in charge, I'm at ease'Hua Guofeng
